title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin defends Jim Harbaugh for once again going for 2 to win in regulation as opposed to playing for overtime as the Ravens tried to complete their comeback over the Packers with a backup QB. After another low scoring win, he takes a look at the Cowboys and if their slumping offense has enough firepower to contend for a Super Bowl in the NFC. He tells you why he was right about Anthony Davis and wrong about Trevor Lawrence. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Greg Olsen joins the show to discuss Kyler Murray's regression over the last few weeks and if the Cardinals should be worried about their star QB as they close in on the playoffs.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
